pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Products = let
  Source = Sql.Database(DatabaseServer, DatabaseName),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Products"]}[Data],
  RenamedColumns = Table.RenameColumns(Navigation, {{"Title", "Product"}}),
  SplitColumnByDelimiter = Table.SplitColumn(RenamedColumns, "ProductCategory", Splitter.SplitTextByDelimiter(" > "), {"Category", "Subcategory"}),
  ChooseColumns = Table.SelectColumns(SplitColumnByDelimiter, {"ProductId", "ProductCode", "Product", "Description", "Category", "Subcategory", "ProductImageUrl"})
in
  ChooseColumns;
shared DatabaseServer = let
  DatabaseServer = "devcamp.database.windows.net" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  DatabaseServer;
shared DatabaseName = let
  DatabaseName = "WingtipSalesDev" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  DatabaseName;
